wybug_title: 赶集网活动手机验证码发送缺陷和物理路径泄露
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2011-01-20：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2011-01-20：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 向http://v.ganji.com/code/sendCode/          post:phone=15158199***   就能往指定手机不断发送验证码，可形成短信轰炸直接访问http://v.ganji.com/code/sendCode/     爆出物理路径等敏感信息 详细说明：  http://v.ganji.com/code/sendCode/   漏洞证明：  Notice: Undefined index: phone in /data/server/www/ganji_v3/apps/lottery/controller/LotteryCodeController.php on line 114Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message '1064: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'AND `service_id` = 15 AND `unique_id` = 'reg_code' AND `send_time` >= 1295501451' at line 3' in /data/server/www/ganji_v3/framework/data/DBMysqli.class.php:188 Stack trace: #0 /data/server/www/ganji_v3/apps/sms/common/SmsUtil.class.php(387): DBMysqli->getOne('SELECT COUNT(*)...') #1 /data/server/www/ganji_v3/apps/lottery/controller/LotteryCodeController.php(117): SmsUtil::getSendSum(NULL, 15, 'reg_code', 60) #2 /data/server/www/ganji_v3/apps/lottery/common/LotteryFront.php(130): LotteryCodeController->sendCodeAction() #3 /data/server/www/ganji_v3/apps/lottery/index.php(16): LotteryFront->dispatch() #4 {main} thrown in /data/server/www/ganji_v3/framework/data/DBMysqli.class.php on line 188   修复方案：  你知道的   版权声明：转载请注明来源 popok@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝 漏洞Rank：6 (WooYun评价)
wybug_level_fromcorp: 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
